flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Alonzo was able to sell 125.5 + 78 = <<125.5+78=203.5>>203.5 kg of tomatoes.
So, there are 245.5 - 203.5 = <<245.5-203.5=24>>24 kg unsold tomatoes.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42, not 24. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
